PageTitle: nat statistics payload enable (NAT instance view)
FuncDef:
The nat statistics payload enable command enables a device to collect NAT forwarding payload statistics.
The undo nat statistics payload enable command disables a device from collecting NAT forwarding payload statistics.
By default, a device is disabled from collecting NAT forwarding payload statistics.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When multiple NAT instances are configured on a device, to collect forwarding payload statistics of a specified NAT instance, run the nat statistics payload enable command in the view of the specified NAT instance. Then run the display nat statistics payload command to view statistics.
Prerequisites
A NAT instance has been configured on a device.This command must be run in the view of a specified NAT instance.

Precautions
The nat statistics payload enable command takes effect only on VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S.
